column4: Hey guys I am having a serious problem getting my sound working in ubuntu gutsy (gnome) my sound card is: 00:14.5 Multimedia audio controller: ATI Technologies Inc IXP SB400 AC'97 Audio Controller (rev 02) i have tried everything sometimes it says an error other times in xmms it plays just with no sound?
anyone?
